data.name: FirstScrollableColumnShouldBeValid
data.value: First scrollable column index should be greater than or equal to zero and less than the number of columns.

data.name: FirstScrollableRowShouldBeValid
data.value: First scrollable row index should be greater than or equal to zero and less than the number of rows.

data.name: InvalidColIndexForMergedResizeProp
data.value: MergedHeaderResizeProportion property can be set only for columns that have merged header

data.name: AutoScrollMoreThanZero
data.value: Auto scroll interval should be greater than zero.

data.name: ColumnIsNotCheckBox
data.value: Column # {0} is not of checkbox type.

data.name: CannotPrintEmptyGrid
data.value: Cannot print empty grid.

data.name: InvalidCurrentSelBlockForClicpboard
data.value: Cannot create clipboard data object for currently selected block of cells because nothing is selected

data.name: InvalidThreadForMethod
data.value: This method should be called from the UI thread where the grid was created.

data.name: NoIGridEmbeddedControl
data.value: embeddedControl must implement IGridEmbeddedControl.

data.name: OnlySolidBrush
data.value: Only SolidBrush can be specified as parameter

data.name: ShouldSetHeaderStateForRegualrCol
data.value: column # {0} does not have check box on its header. Use overloaded HeaderInfo method for such columns.

data.name: FirstScrollableWillBeBad
data.value: The first scrollable index will not be valid after deletion.

data.name: ShouldBeNoDataForMergedColumHeader
data.value: Text and bitmap for the header item that is merged with the one to its right cannot be specified.

data.name: InvalidGridStateForClipboard
data.value: Clipboard operation cannot be performed in current grid state.

data.name: ScrollPosShouldBeMoreOrEqualZero
data.value: Parameter should be greater than or equal to zero.

data.name: InvalidCustomColType
data.value: Custom ColumnType should be greater than or equal to GridColumnType.FirstCustomColumnType.

data.name: InvalidCellType
data.value: EditableCellType should be greater than or equal to EditableCellType.FirstCustomEditableCellType.

data.name: ShouldSetHeaderStateForCheckBox
data.value: column # {0} has check box on its header. Use overloaded HeaderInfo method for such columns.

data.name: NoMultiBlockSelInSingleSelMode
data.value: Cannot set multiple selection blocks while in single selection mode.

data.name: InvalidSelStringInEmbeddedCombo
data.value: EmbeddedComboBox.SetCurSelectionAsString: item that must be selected does not exist.

data.name: HorizScrollUnitShouldBeGreaterThanZero
data.value: Horizontal scroll unit should be greater than zero.

data.name: CannotSetMergeItemState
data.value: state of the header item that is merged with the one to its right cannot be specified.

data.name: InvalidMergedHeaderResizeProportion
data.value: MergedHeaderResizeProportion property should be between 0f and 1f.

data.name: NonExistingGridSelectionBlock
data.value: Cannot select non-existing cell ({0}, {1}, {2}, {3}).

data.name: LastNonScrollCannotBeMerged
data.value: Last non-scrollable column cannot have merged header.

data.name: NoIGridEmbeddedControlManagement
data.value: embeddedControl MUST implement IGridEmbeddedControlManagement

data.name: ColumnWidthShouldBeGreaterThanZero
data.value: Column width should be greater than zero.

data.name: ColumnWidthShouldBeLessThanMax
data.value: Column width in pixels should be less than or equal to {0}.

data.name: CellHeightShouldBeGreaterThanZero
data.value: Cell height must be greater than zero.

data.name: DeriveToImplementCustomColumn
data.value: Use class derived from the grid control to implement custom columns.

data.name: NumOfRowsShouldBeGreaterThanZero
data.value: Number of rows should be greater than or equal to zero.

data.name: InvalidSelIndexInEmbeddedCombo
data.value: EmbeddedComboBox.SetCurSelectionIndex: invalid index.

data.name: GridColumnNumberShouldBeAboveZero
data.value: Grid column number should be greater than zero.

data.name: RowIndexShouldBeInRange
data.value: Row index must be greater than or equal to zero and less than the number of rows.

data.name: CurControlIsNotIGridEmbedded
data.value: Unrecoverable error; current control is not IGridEmbeddedControl.

data.name: GridColumnInfoCollectionIsReadOnly
data.value: GridColumnInfoCollection is read-only, and its items cannot be modified.

data.name: ColumnIndexShouldBeInRange
data.value: Column index must be greater than or equal to zero and less than the number of columns.
